page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT and HOUSING
page.content: We sent out 350 questionnaires and 62% of the ones that were returned said their parents had {employment} in London.I think so many people work there because we live in a commuterbelt area.There are also alot of jobs in London.There are many other places where people work,and a large number of these are within a 20 mile radius of Chalfont St. Peter. There is not much {unemployment} here,and it is a very wealthy area. Our questionnaire also included a section about {housing}.There were three subsections 60% of those returned said they lived in detached houses, 22% said they lived in semidetached houses.
